item.title: 2020-04-20 17:30 Making interactive web apps with {shiny} - SkåneR UseR! Group
item.description: {shiny} is a popular R package for making interactive web interfaces in R. With it you can build an interface to your data in just a few steps, allowing you or your users to explore and interact with the data directly. In this workshop, we will go through the minimum st...

item.title: 2020-03-26 18:00 Intro to Neo4j - Neo4j-Öresund
item.description: Neo4j is a graph database. What does that mean? What's it used for? What can it do for me? Does it have something to do with GraphQL? We'll answer these questions and more with this introduction to Neo4j with a mix of presentation, demonstration and hands-on experimenta...
